meanings.definition: Treated to resist or withstand fire.
meanings.sent1: The flameproofed curtains kept the room safe from fire.
meanings.sent2: The flameproofed fabric prevented the flames from spreading.
meanings.sent3: The flameproofed jacket made him look like a fireman!
meanings.sent4: Her flameproofed gloves were like shields against the fiery danger.
meanings.sent5: The flameproofed building stood strong amidst the blazing inferno.

meanings.sent1: The flameproofed walls of the house protected it from the fire.
meanings.sent2: The flameproofed material did not catch fire easily.
meanings.sent3: She felt like a superhero in her flameproofed cape!
meanings.sent4: The flameproofed barrier held back the fiery threat.
meanings.sent5: His flameproofed suit shimmered in the light of the flames.

meanings.sent1: The flameproofed equipment remained unharmed in the fire.
meanings.sent2: The flameproofed coating shielded the wood from burning.
meanings.sent3: The flameproofed phone survived the accidental bonfire!
meanings.sent4: Her flameproofed treasure chest kept her valuables safe from the flames.
meanings.sent5: The flameproofed shield defended against the scorching heat.
